alert.note: Alert for Dripping Springs; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; Globe, Miami; Mazatzal Mountains; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Rio Verde, Salt River; Southeast Gila County; Superior; Tonto Basin (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 3:52AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Gila, Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 445 AM MST... At 352 AM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Claypool to near Sunflower. Movement was southwest at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Globe, Superior, Sugarloaf Mountain, Ballantine Trailhead, Roosevelt, Round Valley, Sunflower, Miami, Roosevelt Dam, Top-Of-The-World, Canyon Lake, Central Heights-Midland City, Tonto National Monument, Goldfield Ranch, Four Peaks, Apache Lake, Top Of The World, Punkin Center, Claypool and Saguaro Lake. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 227 and 253, and between mile markers 259 and 262, and near mile marker 264. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 193 and 229. AZ Route 188 between mile markers 214 and 267. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Dripping Springs; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; Globe, Miami; Mazatzal Mountains; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Rio Verde, Salt River; Southeast Gila County; Superior; Tonto Basin
